name: SpeedDial
description: When pressed, a floating action button can display multiple primary actions that can be performed on a page.

model.label: model
model.title: MenuModel instance to define the action items.

visible.label: visible
visible.title: Specifies the visibility of the overlay.

direction.label: direction
direction.title: Specifies the opening direction of actions.

transition-delay.label: transitionDelay
transition-delay.title: Transition delay step for each action item.

type.label: type
type.title: Specifies the opening type of actions.

mask.label: mask
mask.title: Whether to show a mask element behind the speeddial.

hide-on-click-outside.label: hideOnClickOutside
hide-on-click-outside.title: Whether the actions close when clicked outside.

button-class.label: buttonClass
button-class.title: Style class of the button element.

mask-style.label: maskStyle
mask-style.title: Inline style of the mask element.

mask-class.label: maskClass
mask-class.title: Style class of the mask element.

show-icon.label: showIcon
show-icon.title: Show icon of the button element.

hide-icon.label: hideIcon
hide-icon.title: Hide icon of the button element.

rotate-animation.label: rotateAnimation
rotate-animation.title: Defined to rotate showIcon when hideIcon is not present.

tooltip-options.label: tooltipOptions
tooltip-options.title: Whether to display the tooltip on items. The modifiers of Tooltip can be used like an object in it. Valid keys are 'event' and 'position'.

aria-label.label: ariaLabel
aria-label.title: Defines a string value that labels an interactive list element.

aria-labelledby.label: ariaLabelledby
aria-labelledby.title: Identifier of the underlying list element.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
